verses.verse: Moreover you shall make<WH6213> the tabernacle<WH4908> with ten<WH6235> curtains<WH3407> of fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>, and blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144>: with cherubims<WH3742> of cunning<WH2803> work<WH4639> shall you make them<WH6213>.

The length<WH753> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> shall be eight<WH8083> and twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520>, and the breadth<WH7341> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> four<WH702> cubits<WH520>: and every one of the curtains<WH3407> shall have one<WH259> measure<WH4060>.
The five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> shall be coupled together<WH2266> one<WH802> to another<WH269>; and other five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> shall be coupled<WH2266> one<WH802> to another<WH269>.

And you shall make<WH6213> loops<WH3924> of blue<WH8504> upon the edge<WH8193> of the one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> from the woven edge<WH7098> in the coupling<WH2279>; and likewise shall you make<WH6213> in the outmost<WH7020> edge<WH8193> of another curtain<WH3407>, in the coupling<WH4225> of the second<WH8145>.

Fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> shall you make<WH6213> in the one<WH259> curtain<WH3407>, and fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> shall you make<WH6213> in the edge<WH7097> of the curtain<WH3407> that is in the coupling<WH4225> of the second<WH8145>; that the loops<WH3924> may take hold<WH6901> one<WH802> of another<WH269>.

And you shall make<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> clasps<WH7165> of gold<WH2091>, and couple<WH2266> the curtains<WH3407> together with<WH802> the clasps<WH7165>: and it shall be one<WH259> tabernacle<WH4908>.
And you shall make<WH6213> curtains<WH3407> of goats<WH5795>' hair to be a covering<WH168> upon the tabernacle<WH4908>: eleven<WH6249> curtains<WH3407> shall you make<WH6213>.

The length<WH753> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> shall be thirty<WH7970> cubits<WH520>, and the breadth<WH7341> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> four<WH702> cubits<WH520>: and the eleven<WH6249> curtains<WH3407> shall be all of one<WH259> measure<WH4060>.

And you shall couple<WH2266> five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> by themselves<WH8337>, and six curtains<WH3407> by themselves<WH3717>, and shall double the sixth<WH8345> curtain<WH3407> in the forefront<WH4136> of the tabernacle<WH168>.

And you shall make<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> on the edge<WH8193> of the one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> that is outmost<WH7020> in the coupling<WH2279>, and fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> in the edge<WH8193> of the curtain<WH3407> which couples<WH2279> the second<WH8145>.

And you shall make<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> clasps<WH7165> of brass<WH5178>, and put<WH935> the clasps<WH7165> into the loops<WH3924>, and couple<WH2266> the tent<WH168> together<WH259>, that it may be one.

And the remnant<WH5629> that remains<WH5736> of the curtains<WH3407> of the tent<WH168>, the half<WH2677> curtain<WH3407> that remains<WH5736>, shall hang<WH5628> over the backside<WH268> of the tabernacle<WH4908>.

And a cubit<WH520> on the one side<WH2088>, and a cubit<WH520> on the other side of that which remains<WH5736> in the length<WH753> of the curtains<WH3407> of the tent<WH168>, it shall hang<WH5628> over the sides<WH6654> of the tabernacle<WH4908> on this side and on that side<WH3680>, to cover it.
And you shall make<WH6213> a covering<WH4372> for the tent<WH168> of rams<WH352>' skins<WH5785> dyed red<WH119>, and a covering<WH4372> above<WH4605> of badgers<WH8476>' skins<WH5785>.
And you shall make<WH6213> boards<WH7175> for the tabernacle<WH4908> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086> standing up<WH5975>.
Ten<WH6235> cubits<WH520> shall be the length<WH753> of a board<WH7175>, and a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> shall be the breadth<WH7341> of one<WH259> board<WH7175>.

Two<WH8147> tenons<WH3027> shall there be in one<WH259> board<WH7175>, set in order<WH7947> one<WH802> against another<WH269>: thus shall you make<WH6213> for all the boards<WH7175> of the tabernacle<WH4908>.
And you shall make<WH6213> the boards<WH7175> for the tabernacle<WH4908>, twenty<WH6242> boards<WH7175> on the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> southward<WH8486>.

And you shall make<WH6213> forty<WH705> sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701> under the twenty<WH6242> boards<WH7175>; two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under one<WH259> board<WH7175> for his two<WH8147> tenons<WH3027>, and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under another<WH259> board<WH7175> for his two<WH8147> tenons<WH3027>.
And for the second<WH8145> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908> on the north<WH6828> side<WH6285> there shall be twenty<WH6242> boards<WH7175>:
And their forty<WH705> sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701>; two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under one<WH259> board<WH7175>, and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under another<WH259> board<WH7175>.
And for the sides<WH3411> of the tabernacle<WH4908> westward<WH3220> you shall make<WH6213> six<WH8337> boards<WH7175>.
And two<WH8147> boards<WH7175> shall you make<WH6213> for the corners<WH4742> of the tabernacle<WH4908> in the two sides<WH3411>.

And they shall be coupled<WH8382> together beneath<WH4295>, and they shall be coupled<WH8382> together<WH3162> above the head<WH7218> of it unto one<WH259> ring<WH2885>: thus shall it be for them both<WH8147>; they shall be for the two<WH8147> corners<WH4740>.

And they shall be eight<WH8083> boards<WH7175>, and their sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701>, sixteen<WH8337> sockets<WH134>; two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under one<WH259> board<WH7175>, and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under another<WH259> board<WH7175>.
And you shall make<WH6213> bars<WH1280> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>; five<WH2568> for the boards<WH7175> of the one<WH259> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908>,

And five<WH2568> bars<WH1280> for the boards<WH7175> of the other<WH8145> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, and five<WH2568> bars<WH1280> for the boards<WH7175> of the side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, for the two sides<WH3411> westward<WH3220>.
And the middle<WH8484> bar<WH1280> in the middle<WH8432> of the boards<WH7175> shall reach<WH1272> from end<WH7097> to end<WH7097>.

And you shall overlay<WH6823> the boards<WH7175> with gold<WH2091>, and make<WH6213> their rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091> for places<WH1004> for the bars<WH1280>: and you shall overlay<WH6823> the bars<WH1280> with gold<WH2091>.
And you shall set up<WH6965> the tabernacle<WH4908> according to the fashion<WH4941> there which was showed<WH7200> you in the mountain<WH2022>.

And you shall make<WH6213> a veil<WH6532> of blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144>, and fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336> of cunning<WH2803> work<WH4639>: with cherubims<WH3742> shall it be made<WH6213>:

And you shall hang<WH5414> it upon four<WH702> pillars<WH5982> of acacia<WH7848> wood overlaid<WH6823> with gold<WH2091>: their hooks<WH2053> shall be of gold<WH2091>, upon the four<WH702> sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701>.

And you shall hang up<WH5414> the veil<WH6532> under the clasps<WH7165>, that you may bring<WH935> in there inside<WH1004> the veil<WH6532> the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>: and the veil<WH6532> shall divide<WH914> unto you between the holy<WH6944> place and the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944>.
And you shall put<WH5414> the mercy seat<WH3727> upon the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715> in the most<WH6944> holy place<WH6944>.

And you shall set<WH7760> the table<WH7979> outside<WH2351> the veil<WH6532>, and the lampstand<WH4501> over against<WH5227> the table<WH7979> on the side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908> toward the south<WH8486>: and you shall put<WH5414> the table<WH7979> on the north<WH6828> side<WH6763>.

And you shall make<WH6213> an hanging<WH4539> for the door<WH6607> of the tent<WH168>, of blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8438>, and fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>, done<WH4639> with needlework<WH7551>.

And you shall make<WH6213> for the hanging<WH4539> five<WH2568> pillars<WH5982> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6823>, and overlay them with gold<WH2091>, and their hooks<WH2053> shall be of gold<WH2091>: and you shall cast<WH3332> five<WH2568> sockets<WH134> of brass for them<WH5178>.
